Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money.
Reviews.Author: Rebecca R Sutton
Reviews.Content: Slow didn't hold a charge. Stopped working and this all happened after it charged for 8 hours in a row. When dealing with Amazon about it they refunded and told me that they would wave shipping if I bought a  new one but they didn't.  Also it was such a hassel working with them.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money like I did. Junk.
Reviews.Author: Clinton
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money like I did. Quit working in less than a month. Spent 69 dollars and got junk in return.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Leonardo J. Botelho
Reviews.Content: There is no other definition to this item. It is cheap in price and quality. If it was not so slow, I might have kept, but I returned it.

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: rosangelina palacio
Reviews.Content: this tablet was for my 14 year old son. its light weight non expensive . good for children thanks amazon

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: SHEILA A.HORTON
Reviews.Content: This is a very good tablet works like a rabbit yes it links with the internet very fast, no programing needed. Easy to download items

Reviews.Title: Total Junk
Reviews.Author: R. C. Goddard "Whitetail Fanatic"
Reviews.Content: Took a chance, and failed.I had an Archos tablet prior to this one, but when the mini-usb power solder connection broke I wanted a quick cheap replacement.CHEAP being the operative word here - this Axess tablet has poor battery life, network connectivity is spotty at best, can't multitask, cheaply constructed switch platforms....frankly I can't think of a single facet of this product that I would have a kind word for.  This being my 3rd tablet experience with 3 different brands, I can honestly say it's a total piece of crap.
